en.title: FusionExcel Exclusive Sponsor Of World Champion Ramazan Ramazanov (The Punisher), WBC Muay Thai World Championship Title Fight, World Trade Centre, Dubai, 13th June 2008!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to announce the EXCLUSIVE SPONSORSHIP of WMC Muay Thai Heavyweight Champion , Russian Ramazan Ramazanov (The Punisher ), at WBC (World Boxing Council) Muay Thai World Championship Title Fight against Rodney Faverus of Holland, to be held at the Dubai World Trade Centre 8pm on 13th June 2008.

The title fight will be in front of 30,000 International spectators and telecast live to millions around the world through Euro sports, Al Jazeera, ART, Russian TV Network, MuayThai.com, Martial Arts TV and other sports channels.

During the fight, Ramazan will be wearing shorts with FusionExcel's logo and website featured prominently on it. His corner handlers will all be wearing T-shirts with FE's logo and website featured prominently. In all press interviews. during the lead up to the title fight, Ramazan will be wearing FusionExcel's Tshirt and QP prominently.

It is a great opportunity for FusionExcel to BRAND itself to MILLIONS in the world and bulld global recognition!
 
>>Read Ramazan Ramazanov's Testimonial

meta.description: FE is proud to announce the EXCLUSIVE SPONSORSHIP of WMC Muay Thai Heavyweight Champion.
